Content: Camera was available from the website at a good price. Next day delivery worked exactly as it should, with DPD informing us of one hour delivery slot in advance.  Could not ask for more.
Part exchanging old lens for a new lens. Best price for both and very easy process. Good communication.
Excellent! Great film, delivered quickly. Very pleased.
Excellent product delivered on time but the communications were mixed messages
Accurate product description, prompt delivery. All in all great service.
Great service and great prices. Very pleased with the level of communication which kept me updated but not bombarded with emails

The item ordered was delivered as described, I decided it wasn't what I wanted, the return was simple and courteous, Wex are probably my favourite source of used camera gear, I only wish DPD could leave my parcels at the local post office

I have used Wex Photo Video many times over the past couple of years. I have bought both new lenses and used lenses, and have traded-in my own equipment. I have found them to be professional, extremely helpful and friendly, and very trustworthy. I would confidently say Wex Photo Video is my go-to store for photography equipment.
Clear rules, fast delivery, great contact, competitive prices.
I've used WEX for years. Always had a good experience.  Sellers are always friendly, patient and informative.  If you need equipment new or used I would totally recommend WEX
Transaction was very smooth and exceptionally happy with the process. The lens was posted quickly and completely satisfied
Great to deal with kept me informed at all times regarding my order, just a shame that Canon were very slow in delivering their new products within a reasonable timeframe.
Good component ,reasonably priced and delivered on time

Bought a software licence from them.  I didnt expect to find it on WEX, but it was at a discount to current list price and everything was fine,. Reassuringly they had promptly replied to my query prior to purchase

Just a quick rating, as the emailed questionaire is suffering problems.  TO reiterate previous comments, once again, more than overjoyed with WEX.  Brilliant, quick. Good prices and no fuss.  Online pros!
Quick dispatch and the item was well packaged. Wex is an excellent website for high quality second hand items.
Bag arrived the very next day as promised.  Another great experience shopping at Wex.   Telesales Team: Thank You!
Always helpful - problems are dealt with pronto. I will continue to buy for them.
Swift service. Accurate on line information and good prices.

I purchased my item and delivery was so fast. Unfortunately the item was not compatible with my phone & therefore had to be returned. The return process was so easy and also processed so quickly.  I would definitely use this company again without hesitation.  10/10 for customer service.
Excellent service with next day delivery.
Great customer service and fast delivery.
Have used WEX for years and they have always provided sterling service and great products
Ordered a lens late afternoon delivered the following morning. Great service
The correct item, properly packaged, delivered on time, at a good price. What's not to like ?
Order received quickly and exactly as described. Great service,would definitely use again
Great service, quickly addressed what in my view was an ambiguously advertised item on sale on the website, by offering a discount and correcting the issue.

Very easy my 14year old grandson is very impressed with your company and it makes my life mush easier. 
Good service prompt delivery thank you ðŸ˜Š

I sold a camera lens online to Wex after receiving quotes from a few camera stores.
They offered Â£305 based on my own rating of the camera condition, and this was subject to their checks of the lens.
I was pleasantly surprised to be paid Â£315 instead, presumably as the lens was in better condition than I had ranked it.
Clearly a very honest, trustworthy company that isn't in it just for the cash.
Have used them before and will do again.
The easiest way to spend money that I have found but great products...great service...great fun!
checkout not working,  log in broken, links back to paypal stopped. used 3 broswers
I have used Wex on previous occasions excellent service
Was easy to find details of the leans and then place an order
Pity what I need is out of stock
I found great improvement incl. better sortiment of different photographic products.

So far so good. It was easy to find the product I wanted, the price was good, It was easy to check stock, it was easy to pay and the delivery options are good. However you have asked me to review before I have even left the web site or taken delivery so I can hope the fulfilment of the order is as good as the placing of the order. Fingers crossed.
Easy to navigate website and good part-ex price.
Easy, clear and fast to buy.
Absoluitely fine service. Quick response to a pre-sales query, and painless purchase off website
Great experience using live chat with Danny J, he was extremely knowledgeable and helpful.
I trust this photo gear shop very much and would recommend it to a friend.
Had the product I wanted, and at a competitive price
Quick and easy, good delivery options.
Quick and easy to order online.
AAA ðŸ’¯ symbol and easy it's not my first purchase but always happy very satisfied
Have stock of item where many others will advise when item will become available. Web site was very slow but could just be me.
Excellent, having used this company before I ordered with complete confidence.
Returning customer, good online ordering experience.
one has to look carefully to use a voucher
Very smooth quick and easy. Item in stock and good selection of payment options
Easy to find required items on website.  Straightforward processing order online
super efficient, no hassle ordering and delivery choice
I think this is my first time using WEX.  I should reserve judgement until delivery is complete, but so far, so good! :)
Excellent customer service with great choice and prices.
You need to enable Apple Pay in the process earlier, before having to log in or go to PayPal
Very easy to shop at wex always
Good lens and price,page became unresponsive an took ages to buy
super easy service to use well laid out and easy to navigate will 100% returning for future camera needs
quick and easy with a decent finance offer
